hero.title: FRAN CARRASCO
hero.tagline: Transforming ideas into digital solutions with AI

about.title: My Philosophy: The Architect & Pilot
about.paragraph_1: Full-Stack Developer with over 6 years of experience in web application development, automation, and neural networks with Python. I specialize in producing clear and maintainable code.
about.paragraph_3: I have collaborated with teams of different sizes on multiple projects and am capable of working both remotely and in-office, according to the company's needs.

items.title: Agent Orchestration & Flow Control
items.description: I act as a "Conductor" managing Sub-Agents (mini-J.A.R.V.I.S.) specialized in PM, Testing, Architecture, or Security Audit tasks. Strategic LLM selection based on task: Sonnet (v4.5) for maximum intelligence, Opus for complex reasoning, Haiku for scoped roles.

items.title: Project Contextualization & Prompt Engineering
items.description: Use of context files like agents.md and context folders to define the project mission, code standards (e.g., snake_case), and references (e.g., SQL database schema). Maximization of AI effectiveness through structured context.

items.title: AI-Assisted Development Workflow
items.description: Implementation of TDD (Test-Driven Development), using AI to generate extensive test suites (more than 20-40 tests per feature). Transformation of requirements into GHERKIN format for acceptance criteria creation. Integration with management tools via MCP.

items.title: Security & Audit
items.description: Application of the Security by Design principle to mitigate vulnerable code generated by AI (Vulnerability as a Service). Knowledge and mitigation of common OWASP Top 10 web vulnerabilities, such as Broken Access Control and brute force attacks.

items.title: Research & Accelerated Learning
items.description: Use of AI tools (such as Notebook LM) to narrow knowledge sources, generate summaries, mind maps, flashcards, and quizzes, eliminating AI hallucinations through source referencing.

items.title: Workflow Automation (No-Code/Low-Code)
items.description: Experience with Open Source tools like N8N to create complex workflows, including the use of Scrape AI for obtaining web data not available via API. Rapid MVP development integrating backends (e.g., Firebase Studio, Google Sheets).

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer
jobs.company_and_dates: IT Marketing Media-line SLU (Feb 2024 – Oct 2024, Málaga, Spain)
responsibilities: Define and implement digitalization strategies for businesses across various sectors, employing scientific methods and Proof of Concepts (PoC) to significantly improve their sales.
Meticulously plan and apply innovative approaches, adapting technological solutions to each company's needs to maximize efficiency and profitability.
Focus on leveraging cutting-edge technology and data to optimize processes and achieve superior sales performance.
jobs.technologies: Python (Django, Flask, Restframework), Libraries (Selenium, unittest, pandas, requests, Pillow, NumPy, OpenCV), PHP, HTML5, JavaScript, GitHub, Jenkins pipelines, Asana, Fork, Bash scripts, GNU/Linux

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer
jobs.company_and_dates: Cocinasplus design SLU (Feb 2021 – Feb 2023, Málaga, Spain)
responsibilities: Modernized an outdated website to make it responsive and compliant with current standards.
Designed test plans and scripts that reduced test redundancy by 60% and ensured more stable results.
Developed a desktop application to automate database validation, increasing efficiency by 75%.
Automated costly processes that previously depended on subscription services and integrated various functionalities.
jobs.technologies: Python (Django, Flask), Libraries (BeautifulSoup, pytest, pandas, requests, Pillow, NumPy, OpenCV), PHP, HTML5, JavaScript, GitHub, Jenkins pipelines, Asana, Fork, PowerShell scripts

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer (Junior)
responsibilities: Programmed JavaScript forms to interact with the database and make external API calls, improving operational efficiency and user experience.
Implemented improvements to optimize the website and make it more responsive, contributing to a 55% increase in sales.

Used Python to develop neural networks (Keras, TensorFlow) focused on identifying fields in identity documents (DNI, NIE, passport, driver's license), achieving 97.83% accuracy, superior to previous commercial solutions.
jobs.technologies: Python, Libraries (Keras, TensorFlow, pytest, pandas, requests, Pillow, NumPy, OpenCV), PHP (CodeIgniter 3, Laravel), HTML5, JavaScript (React, Vue.js), GitHub, Asana, Fork, PowerShell and Bash scripts

jobs.title: Manager
responsibilities: Managed a service company for homeowner associations, overseeing up to 25 employees.
Acquired administrative and human resources skills, negotiations and conflict resolution, essential for the success of an SME.
jobs.technologies: Business Management, Human Resources, Negotiation, Conflict Resolution
